wikipedia_page.main: George Houston RSA, RI, RSW (20 January 1869 – 5 October 1947) was a Scottish artist. He was a prolific landscape painter, using both oil and watercolour. He primarily depicted scenes of Argyll and Ayrshire.

response: *George Houston (painter) (1869–1947), Scottish oil and watercolour artist
*George Houston House, 1860 American home listed on National Register of Historic Places in 1980

Works of art in the building include a painting by Henry John Dobson depicting an old lady spinning, and a painting by George Pirie depicting a boy with a terrier and pups, as well as landscape paintings by Alexander Brownlie Docharty, George Houston and Archibald David Reid.
